name: Wonder Lens
description:
SYNOPSIS

A famous photographer launches a challenge: Wonder Lens. The goal is to recreate the photographer's old pictures of the wonders of the world. The winner will receive his famous old reflex and will be able to work as a reporter for a famous international magazine.

HOW TO PLAY

All you have to do is grab your camera and follow our instructions. During your trip you’ll be instructed on how to use different settings in order to obtain the best result. Every time you have to take a picture you’ll have to consult the references’ gallery (pressing G), remember that you have 3 chances to take the most accurate picture and go look for the next wonder. You’ll have to collect some material in order to be able to take your pictures, to do this you’ll have to follow the map.

COMMANDS Player Movement: W - A - S - D Camera Movement: Mouse Use the Reflex: F Take a Photo: K See Gallery References: G Inventory: C Toggle Pause Menu: Esc DEVELOPERS:
